doc.title: Ana's Choice
doc.plot: Ana is an artist living in New York City, painting at night and working as a waitress during the day to support herself and her father back home in Romania. She is waiting for news regarding her visa change that would allow her to visit her country after two and a half years when she learns that her father has fallen sick. When Ana's application is denied she has to choose between staying in America to pursue her painting passion and going back home to be with her dying father, risking the chance of never being able to return. What will Ana choose?
